entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:52 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Thunderstorm, -4.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 3:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Condition: Thunderstorm

Visibility: 10 km
Humidity: 84 %

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets and risk of a thunderstorm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:10 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to rain showers in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning and afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:10 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to 9 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending before morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h then southwest 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature rising to 9 in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:10 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
